channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Explosions at US Steel plant in Pennsylvania leave 1 dead, 1 missing, 10 injured
item.description: Explosions at a U.S. Steel plant that shook the ground near Pittsburgh left one dead and sent at least 10 to hospitals with emergency workers still searching the badly charred rubble hours later for a missing worker.

item.title: Police say 3 dead in a shooting at a Target in Austin, Texas, and a suspect has been detained
